text:
[Verse]
Sunshine in my eyes
Bright blue skies
Laughter fills the air
No worry no care

[Verse 2]
Feet in the sand
Holding your hand
Waves kiss the shore
Wanting nothing more

[Chorus]
Summer dreams come alive
Feel the vibe feel the drive
Every day’s a holiday
In this sunny bay

[Verse 3]
Music in the breeze
Dancing with ease
Hearts beating fast
Wishing it would last

[Chorus]
Summer dreams come alive
Feel the vibe feel the drive
Every day’s a holiday
In this sunny bay

[Bridge]
Stars in the night
Burning bright
Moonlight so sweet
Time feels complete
title: Summer Dreams
